text: Fikret Otyam (December 19, 1926 – August 9, 2015) was a Turkish painter and journalist. He began his career in journalism. He later moved to painting and photography. He worked for the Son Saat, Dünya, Akın, Ulus, Kudret and Cumhuriyet newspapers.Otyam, Fikret, Republic of Turkey Ministry of Culture and Tourism web site Otyam died of kidney failure at Antalya on August 9, 2015. He was 88 years old. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Turkish journalists Category:Turkish painters Category:20th- century artists
title: Fikret Otyam
